skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: bloom sky
Developer Terms of Use
des:
UPDATE: BloomSky accounts set up through ‘Facebook login’ now compatible.

To use the skill, you must have account access to a BloomSky station that is online. Get started by logging into your BloomSky account using your BloomSky username and password. Your device will be automatically linked. If you have multiple devices under the same account, the default device will be the first device based on you device name listed in alphabetical order. 

Remember to start each command by saying, "Alexa, ask Bloom Sky for"

For example, you can say;
 Alexa, ask Bloom Sky for the temperature (pressure / humidity)
 Alexa, ask Bloom Sky for temperature (pressure / humidity)
 Alexa, ask Bloom Sky for current temperature (pressure / humidity)

For storm device owner, you can still search daily rain accumulation and wind speed.
